title: Shelly Wang, MD - | Nicklaus Children's Hospital
description: Dr. Shelly Wang is a pediatric neurosurgeon at Nicklaus Children's Hospital. Her clinical interests include epilepsy, hydrocephalus, and anomalies of the central nervous system.
